original_text: Obed-Edom’s son Shemaiah also had sons, who were leaders in their father’s family because they were very capable men.
korean_text: 그의 아들 스마야도 두어 아들을 낳았으니 그들의 조상의 가문을 다스리는 자요 큰 용사라

sentences.original_text: Obed-Edom's son Shemaiah also had sons
who were leaders in their father's family
because they were very capable men
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들은 매우 유능한 사람들이었기 때문이다
